test_case.title: Verification of 'Complete feature list >' Hyperlink
pre_condition: The user has any Mac device with macOS 11 (Big Sur), macOS 12 (Monterey), macOS 13 (Ventura), or macOS 14 (Sonoma) and has opened the Keynote app pop-up window from Spotlight Search.
Ensure that if the user has not opened the Keynote app for some time and changes have been made, the pop-up window includes additional information as specified in the steps below.

steps.action: In the Keynote app pop-up window, click on the 'Complete feature list >' hyperlink.
steps.expected_result: The Safari browser opens with the URL address https://support.apple.com/guide/keynote/whats-new-in-keynote-140-tan700f60676/mac, displaying the page titled 'Keynote User Guide for Mac on Apple's support website, containing relevant information.
